positions.title: Consultant
positions.description_html:
-Use the appropriate channels and methods for sourcing / mapping candidates based on business needs.
-Sourcing/ attracting candidates from a variety of sources (Job boards, bayt, LinkedIn, referrals etc) for external and internal vacancies.
-Creating and posting high quality adverts to attract and engage candidates.
-Interviewing potential candidates via telephone and video.
-Collaborate closely throughout the process with the Talent Acquisition Partners and hiring managers.
-Updating all databases and internal trackers with relevant candidates information.

-Arranging candidate interviews with the clients.
-Research and develop recruiting leads.
-Plan and manage in house recruitment and selection of staff.
-Plan and conduct in house new employee orientation.
-Maintain in house human resource information system and employee’s database.
-Conducting F2F interview for internal hiring.
